templates.name: How do I wash and care for my Blissy?
templates.content:
To keep your Blissy silk looking its best, follow these care instructions:

â¢ Turn your pillowcase inside out and use a mesh laundry bag to prevent snagging.
â¢ Machine wash using the gentle/delicate cycle with cold water.
â¢ Wash with Blissy Wash or another mild, silk-safe pH balanced detergent. Avoid harsh detergents.
â¢ Do not use chlorine bleach or fabric softeners
â¢ For best results, air dry your silk items. If air drying is not possible, tumble dry on the no heat setting or lowest heat for no more than 20 minutes. Use a mesh bag.

templates.name: How do I introduce new fish into my pond?
templates.content:
The pH of your pond should be between 6.5 and 8.0. All new ponds must be treated with a declorinator such as Tetra's Aqua safe or Chlorine and Heavy metal Neutralizer. Water temperature of the pond and water in the fish bag must be equalized. This can be accomplished by floating the bag of fish in your pond for 15 minutes (bag must be in the shade). After this time, remove and discard one cup of water from the bag and replace it with one cup of pond water. Repeat this process three more times at five minute intervals. You can then release the fish into the pond, however you should not dump the water from the bag into your pond.

In addition, if you are not sure the dealer where you purchased your fish employs preventive steps to insure healthy fish, you may want to do a salt dip for 15 seconds using 1 pound of pond salt per gallon of water in a separate container prior to releasing the fish. Do not use iodized salt.

templates.name: What is my MiiR made of?
templates.content:
All MiiR products are constructed of premium, 18/8 (18% chromium, 8% nickel) medical grade stainless steel. Our bottle lids are made of BPA free polypropylene #5, and our press fit lids are made of Eastman Tritanâ¢. Both of these plastics have been tested and neither are known to leach harmful chemicals or present health risks. They carry no bisphenols (BPA, BPS, etc.), estrogenic activity (EA or estrogen leaching) or androgenic activity (AA or testosterone leaching). 

With the exception of products offered in natural stainless steel, all MiiR products are finished with a durable Hardshellâ¢ powder coating to protect and preserve your product's appearance.

If you're scheduled for daytime you will be contacted the night before or early in the morning with your timeframe. If you're scheduled for evening you will be contacted in the afternoon (between 3pm and 5pm) with your timeframe. After that happens you can then use the Track Your Truck tool: https://www.gardner-white.com/customer-service/delivery-tracking

templates.name: Should I use bearing grease on bearings during install?

templates.name: What are set-up bearings?
templates.content: Set-up bearings are bearings that have had their inner diameters machined so they slide on and off a pinion shaft or carrier journal. The advantage to using set-up bearings is that you can quickly install or remove them with different amounts of shims to check both pinion depth and backlash without having to worry about the nice, new bearings you just purchased. Once the correct amount of shim(s) have been found, you simply remove the set-up bearing(s) and install the new bearings with the correct shim.

templates.name: How do I set up my mattress?
templates.content:
We recommend you set up the mattress with 2 people. The Hybrid should be opened within 3 weeks of delivery. The Pro and Original should be opened within 30 days of delivery. 

Bring the box to the room you want to put the mattress in and remove the vacuum-sealed mattress from the box. You can lay the box on its side to pull the mattress out. Unwrap the outer layer of plastic and unfold the mattress. Please do not attempt to cut into the plastic before its unfolded! Next, align the top of the mattress with the top of the bed frame and carefully use scissors to cut away the plastic wrapping. The mattress will start expanding immediately.

templates.name: Cork: The cork is leaking/dripping
templates.content:
I'm sorry that you're having difficulty with your corks. Please be aware that some dripping is perfectly normal as it does take a few minutes for the cork to reseal after the needle has been extracted. A few drops is nothing to be worried about, but it keeps leaking from the needle hole hours later then please review this list of other possible scenarios:
- Ensure you're accessing wines with natural cork. While you can access wines that use -synthetic closures those closures don't reseal and there'll be leakage.
- Sometimes, wine can pool underneath the foil and appear to be dripping or leaking - again, to determine if this is the issue, you can remove the foil to check. This happens most frequently on a first access.
- Temperature affects how a wine reseals. Corks at cooler temperatures take longer to reseal.
- How long did you leave your Coravin in the cork? We don't recommend leaving the needle engaged in the cork for long periods of time, as it can make it more difficult for the cork to reseal.
- Sometimes a cork in poor condition (either due to age, manufacturing, or storage) will have difficulty resealing in general.

Hopefully these tips will help and you might find this video helpful as well: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=m75eTiVsLHg

templates.name: Why wonât my camera respond to my request for a HD photo or video?
templates.content:
First, check the battery level on the photo info strip on the last few night photos. If it's below P5 then that's probably the problem. Once the camera senses that battery power is declining, it may not send HD photos or videos in order to keep running as long as possible.

If that doesn't seem to be the problem, then check to see if there are several commands pending that may be preventing it from responding. You'll want to cancel any pending commands.

templates.name: Mini Guitar Kit - Which strings should I use?
templates.content:
For the Mini Guitar Kits, you can use a standard guitar string set starting at .009" or .010" gauge if you tune A to A, similar to having a capo at the 5th fret of a standard-scale guitar. 

If you want to tune a full octave up to get back to E to E tuning, you can use a .009" set but will need to replace the high-E string with a .007" gauge string. Otherwise, it may break from the added tension. You could also use a set starting with .007", such as our item #1346 Dunlop Reverend Willy's Electric Guitar Strings: https://www.stewmac.com/strings-and-accessories/strings/electric-guitar-strings/dunlop-reverend-willys-electric-guitar-strings/

templates.name: Does the whitening system work on Veneers, or Dentures?

This means that any pre-existing dental work may need to be replaced to match the new tooth shade achieved in the natural teeth, should a bleaching process proceed. Clients typically apply the gel product only to their natural teeth, allowing these treated teeth to lighten up to match a cap, crown, or veneer.

templates.name: What's the difference between the  Super Greens and Super Reds?
templates.content:
The main difference between super reds and super greens is the nutrients they contain as fruits and vegetables of different colors contain distinct amounts of essential vitamins and minerals and unique forms of phytonutrients. 

Super greens include higher amounts of vitamins A and C, magnesium, calcium, and iron, which support vital body functions. The most powerful super greens include: 
â¢ Broccoli 
â¢ Kale 
â¢ Spinach 
â¢ Parsley 
â¢ Barley grass and wheat grass.

In contrast, super reds contain many unique phytonutrients due to their color, such as lycopene and anthocyanins. These help with antioxidation and anti-inflammation. The most powerful super reds include: 
â¢ Cherries 
â¢ Cranberries 
â¢ Acai 
â¢ Pomegranates 
â¢ Red beets

templates.name: Why is your fish shipped frozen instead of fresh?
templates.content: Nothing beats the taste of fish & shellfish fresh out of the water. If you're lucky enough to catch fish yourself and enjoy cooking and eating your catch, or if you live near fishing communities and can buy seafood fresh off the boat, then you know what we're talking about. A few days after fish is caught and filleted, it begins to lose its freshness, bacteria start to do their work, and flavor gradually changes. After 2 weeks, virtually all "fresh" unfrozen fish will no longer be fit to eat. Luckily, fish that is flash-frozen stops the breakdown process. You can then keep this fish in a very fresh state for months, thawing and cooking it when you want to enjoy fish the way it tastes when it comes out of the water. The "fresh" fish that you see in the big-box discount grocery store in your neighborhood is usually either already a week or more old, or previously frozen. The exceptions to this are the natural/high-end grocers and fish markets who carefully source their fish. This is where we come in. We're in the sourcing and processing business - many of those natural/high end retailers are our customers - and in order to offer you a variety of the best fish in a state of freshest flavor, our fish is frozen as soon as possible after processing. In this case, the fish industry's inside quote rings true: Our frozen fish is usually fresher than fresh! It's what we feed our families, and we believe it's what you'll want to eat once you've tried it.

templates.name: How do your boots hold up to water and bad weather?
templates.content: Our boots are made through Goodyear Welt construction. This shoemaking process creates a waterproof barrier between the upper and the outsole. While this does not mean they are 100% waterproof boots, they will easily get you through a few puddles and a bit of snow without your foot getting wet. There are products available that you can use on your boots to better protect the uppers from water damage.

templates.name: How do I apply the nail stickers?
templates.content:
Try these steps for applying our nail stickers!

1. Apply stickers to polish that is completely dry (otherwise it will indent your polish). Sometimes waiting until the next day after painting is best!
2. Press down firmly around the edges of the sticker. Tweezers can help with this and with the application!
3. Seal with two thin coats of Super Glossy Top Coat.
4. Top coat your nails every 2-3 days to keep your sticker mani looking fresh!

templates.name: How do you use the Gel Thinner?
templates.content: You should use the Gel Thinner after every single manicure in both your Pro Base and Finish Gel. If you wait until your liquids already start to thicken to use it, you'll find that your liquids have already been damaged beyond repair. The best way to prolong the life of your liquids with Gel Thinner would be to add 2-5 drops of it to both your bottles of Pro Base and Finish Gel after every single manicure.

templates.name: What is your Aurora material?
templates.content:
Aurora is a sustainable new take on our circular knitting technology, honored with gold-level Cradle to CradleCertificationTM for the technical cycle - the global standard for products crafted according to the principles of the circular economy, in which the garment is an intrinsic part of the ecosystem and can be returned to the biological cycle. It's a revolutionary operating model anchored by five pillars: material health, social fairness, material reutilization,renewable 
energy, and water stewardship. Wolford is the first fashion company to receive the Cradle to Cradle CertificationTM at the gold level for the biological and technical production cycles. The material is made using responsibly sourced and 100% recyclable fibers to ensure it can be fully reused to develop new products.

templates.name: How to eat caviar
templates.content:
Caviar should be served chilled. The eggs can be kept cold by placing the tin in a bowl, nested in a larger bowl of ice. Please avoid using silver utensils, or other metals that oxidize, as it will affect the taste of our product. We recommend a traditional mother of pearl serving spoon.

You should start with small portions of caviar, no more than two small spoonfuls (less than 2 oz.) so that you can enjoy the feeling of the small beads on your tongue. Allow yourself to savor the caviar without chewing to extract the luxurious buttery flavor from the pearls.

For a more in depth look at what's going on inside your gut, we also have our BIOHM Gut Test Kit (https://www.biohmhealth.com/products/gut-report-kit-new) available for purchase, which is a non-diagnostic fecal sample, that tests for the bacterial & fungal strains present in the gut. templates.name: How do I view and claim my rewards?
templates.content:
You may redeem your points for a future order using the instructions below.

1. Visit our Rewards Page:
Visit https://julievos.attn.tv/aokyEGgjxKnz
2. Log In or Join:
Once you're on the Rewards page, click the Get Started button, then select Login.
If you already have a Julie Vos account, please log in. If not, click Create account to set up a new account.
3. Scroll to "Redeem Rewards":
Once you're signed in, scroll down the page until you see the Redeem Rewards section. This is where you'll see how many points you have and how much they're worth.
Here's a screenshot to help you spot it easily: https://julievos.attn.tv/aGWnyajnvdTZ

(This image should show the Redeem Rewards section with the slider and redeem button visible.)

4. Choose How Many Points to Use:
Use the slider to pick how many points you'd like to redeem. You'll see how much money you'll save based on your selection.
5. Click "Redeem":
After choosing your points, click the Redeem button. This will generate a unique discount code just for you.
6. Use the Code at Checkout:
At checkout, paste your code into the box that says "Discount code or gift card", then click Apply.
Helpful Tip:
If you ever lose track of your code, no worries! Just go back to the Redeemed tab in the Redeem Rewards section to view it again.
Points expire 12 months after they are earned, but don't worry - we'll send you a reminder ahead of time so you'll have the chance to use them before they expire.
If you run into any trouble at all, don't hesitate to reach back out, we're always happy to help!

templates.name: What are your sustainability practices?
templates.content: We know that what we make is connected to the health of the earth we share. That's why we invest in products made from thoughtful and responsible materials. Our glasses are made from a portion of recycled glass and natural sand. Our Always Pan is manufactured with 100% post-consumer recycled aluminum. Our packaging is free of traditional plastics, and innovatively designed to eliminate the need for a shipper box, and our box is fully recyclable and biodegradable. Our products are also intended to streamline your kitchen, and reduce the number of items you need to buy. These are just some of our initial sustainability practices, with many more in the works, and if you have any other suggestions for us, we'd love to hear them!

templates.name: What is a hip seat?
templates.content: A hip seat is kinda like fanny pack (also known as a bum bag), but way better. Here's why. A hip seat is a simple baby carrier that wraps around your waist and sits above your hips to help you carry your baby more comfortably, and with less hassle. There's a secure shelf-like seat where your baby sits, while you hold them with an arm. This seat is designed to put your baby's hips in the recommended M-shaped position while taking the strain off of your back, arms, and hips. It's also designed to store items like diapers, wipes, and other essentials inside.

The Metabolism Gummy Rings are made with Apple Cider Vinegar, B12, and Chromium to support lean body mass and help boost metabolism. Prior to starting the use of any supplement, we'd recommend speaking with a healthcare provider that can confirm if there are any potential concerns with medications you may be taking or prior/present medical conditions. Additionally, our gummies aren't formulated with the top 8 allergens (soy, eggs, peanuts, tree nuts, fish, shellfish, wheat, milk). Our manufacturing facility may produce other products that contain those allergens on the same lines as our products, however, our suppliers comply with Good Manufacturing Practices and use appropriate cleaning methods to prevent cross-contamination. The lines are also tested for cross-contamination prior to producing our products.

templates.name: Can Fast Bar be used for prolonged periodic fasting?
templates.content:

templates.name: How do I clean up a liquid dye spill?
templates.content: The liquid dye is very hard to clean up, so the best solution is prevention. If you do spill some of the dye, blot up as much as you can using a paper towel or something disposable. Don't wipe it off or you may end up smearing it. Depending on the surface it was spilled on, you may be able to use WD-40 or a citrus-based cleaner, like our mold cleaner, to help remove it. You can watch this video to see a few different techniques for cleaning liquid dye: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2Fa1sF8RnkE&ab_channel=LoneStarCandleSupply

templates.name: Difference between Titan  Deep Freeze and Titan Guide Series Backpack Coolers
templates.content:
The Ice Wall backpack cooler is insulated with Therma-Flect radiant barrier and an Ultra Safe leak-proof lining with Microban to help protect against bacterial odors and stains. There is also an insulated, zippered compartment on the lid of the cooler and another one in front. The cooler also includes a triple layer ColdBlock base that enhances cold retention. 

As for the Guide Series the exterior is constructed of durable water and stain resistant Rhino-Tech and includes a large front compartment with elasticized gear straps for extra storage and a fleece lined interior valuables pocket. In addition, there are multiple accessory pockets of different sizes and a padded back with Cool Stream breathable mesh panels, adjustable, padded backpack straps, adjustable sternum strap and neoprene carry handles.

templates.name: How many calories can you burn per hour on a StreetStrider?
templates.content: Because StreetStriding is low impact and uses nearly all muscles, it is an excellent cardio-vascular and aerobic exercise that burns lots of calories and can be repeated on a daily basis. Studies have shown that calorie burn rate while StreetStriding is 50% higher than bicycling and 15% higher than riding a stationary elliptical cross trainer. Actual calorie burn rate depends on two things: body weight and velocity. A 200 lb person striding about 12-14 mph will burn approximately 1000 calories per hour.

templates.name: What is my hardiness zone?
templates.content:
The USDA maps all of the US into hardiness zones based on average annual minimum temperature. You can find out which hardiness zone you're in by consulting this map: https://mountaincrestgardens.com/succulent-care/#plant-hardiness 

Once you know which hardiness zone you're in, you can use our Cold Hardiness filter to search for varieties that can grow in your zone. You can plant varieties rated for zones lower than your own, but plants with higher zone ratings will need to be brought indoors during the winter.

templates.name: Are your products 100% organic?
templates.content:
At McConnell's, we have one goal: to make the finest ice creams! We achieve this by having exceptionally high standards across the board. To maintain these standards, it's critical that every ingredient in our ice creams be of the highest
quality. While we're ardent supporters of organics in general, in our almost 70 years as a dairy, it's been our experience that milk & cream can vary greatly in quality and consistency. Inconsistency in milk & cream can be traced to any number of factors, including animal husbandry, pasture type and processing. The milk & cream we use comes from cows raised by local dairy co-ops on the Central
Coast. It's grass-grazed, hormone and antibiotic free, and of exceptionally high quality. It's important to know that organic is a term that defines a process, rather than objective quality. There's wonderful and not-so-wonderful organic milk in the market, just as there's wonderful and not-so-wonderful organic fruit, nuts, chocolate, etc. 

While organic is certainly an important factor when it comes to selecting ingredients for McConnell's Fine Ice Creams, committing wholly to organics - over objective quality - would mean McConnell's valued a specific process over making the finest product we can make and this is unacceptable to us. I hope this informaiton was helpful!

Members earn Points based on every whole dollar spent on an eligible purchase (excluding tax, shipping charges and fees) 30 days after the item(s) have been purchased and shipped. Points earned may be used as a discount against the amount owed for future eligible purchases. Points are not transferable and may not be sold, resold, exchanged or bartered. templates.content: The NIRA Precision Laser feels like a warm, pulsing sensation on your skin. templates.name: How do I determine the % of gray in my hair?
templates.content:
Finding your % of gray is actually pretty simple. First, stand a few feet in front of the mirror with indirect light. Then, use the below as your guide:

- Less than 30% gray: less gray than natural color
- 50% gray: equal parts gray and natural color
- 75% gray: predominately gray with a touch of natural color
- 100% gray: all you see is gray

templates.name: Sport Stick SPF 50: Too dry

For the smoothest application, please ensure your skin is well hydrated and moisturized. Gently apply Sunforgettable Total Protection Sport Stick SPF 50 across all areas of the face then rub in with your fingers until the white layer disappears.

Unlike other mineral SPF products, Sunforgettable Total Protection Sport Stick SPF 50 was expertly formulated to blend in sheer, leaving no white cast for all skin tones. It's important to note, however, that the Sport Stick glides on white so you can easily see where you're applying (and make sure you're getting enough), but it blends easily and invisibly into skin.

templates.name: Do I need new tubes?
templates.content: Installing new tubes may improve the performance of your amp, especially if it has been played a lot! Power tubes wear out with use, and they need changed on a regular basis. Preamp tubes can last much longer, and generally do not need to be changed unless you are unsatisfied with the sound of the amplifier. If your amp still sounds good and is as loud as it should be, you likely do not need to replace the tubes yet.

templates.name: Where are your products made?
templates.content:
We like our fabric quality like we like our sleep quality: premium. We source and manufacture our apparel all over the world depending on where we can find the highest quality fabrics and excellent factories that can produce garments to the standards our customers expect. 

We partner with world-class manufacturers that are committed to fair and equitable practices. The more we grow, and as our manufacturing quantities increase, this will continue to be a priority for us. When developing a product, we choose countries that are best-in-class at the desired raw material fiber and quality, over less expensive labor. 

Our Washable Silk items are made in China, our Restore is made in China and sewn in both China and the USA, and our Pima Cotton is made in Peru!

templates.name: What the band that comes with the Waves 1 & 2 is made of
templates.content:
We put a great deal of care into selecting hypoallergenic materials for Embr Wave, and every material we chose has gone through an extensive evaluation to make sure all Embr Wave devices are safe to wear.

Both the Wave 2 and Wave 1 come with stainless steel Milanese loop bands. The stainless steel band may contain a small amount of nickel, but testing has shown that the amount is below the safety thresholds set by international regulating bodies. If you have concerns about nickel sensitivity, we have the following bands in nylon or vegan leather. You can check out all available accessories here: https://embr.attn.tv/sl/es28OMRk
 
The Wave 1 uses a standard 22mm watch pin, and the Wave 2 uses an 18mm watch pin, so they're both compatible with most styles of watch bands if you'd like to purchase something on your own.
 
The back of the Wave 2 is made of medical-grade polycarbonate (polycarbonate is a type of plastic that's known for being particularly strong). This part of the Wave is made of plastic to help insulate the skin from the metal heat sink, while still being comfortable against the skin. In the Wave 2, the plastic backing is built to be tougher than ever: it's thicker, more durable, and fully integrated into the round design without any protruding edges.

templates.name: How long does it take to charge an electric car?
templates.content:
While gasoline vehicles all "fill up" at about the same speed, different kinds of chargers will charge your EV at different speeds. Level 1 chargers plug into a 110-volt household outlet and really should only be used for plug-in hybrids. They will only add about 3 to 5 miles per hour of charging, making them inconvenient for electric cars. 

Most EV owners will charge using a Level 2 charger at home or work. Running on a 220-volt outlet, a Level 2 charger can deliver between 12 and 80 miles of charge per hour - meaning you can generally get a full charge overnight. Level 3 chargers, or DC fast chargers, are used to get a rapid charge when you're taking a trip. They can deliver a charge rate of 3 to 20 miles per minute or more, and can fill most EVs in less than an hour.

templates.name: What are oil painting reproductions?
templates.content: Oil painting reproductions are hand-made recreations of original paintings. Reproductions allow you to own a replica of a masterpiece that only the very rich could afford. Many of the originals could only be found in world famous art museums. A reproduction is your chance of owning magnificent art at an affordable price.

templates.name: Why is non-toxic cookware important?

templates.name: Which crystals should not get in contact with water?
templates.content: Any crystal that is a 5 or below on the Mohs hardness scale shouldn't be put in water. If left in water for an extended period of time, these crystals will dissolve or crack. Some harder crystals should be kept away from water as well. These include crystals that contain minerals that can rust or can release toxins into the water. Selenite, Malachite, Calcite, Fluorite, Rhodochrosite, Hematite, Jade, and some others are the ones that shouldn't be in touch with water.

templates.name: Are synthetics bad?
templates.content: No, the safety of all fragrance synthetics has been evaluated by the RIFM Expert Panel for Fragrance Safety. The FCA (previously known as IFRA) uses this information to set safe use levels for each ingredient. They are safe to use on skin at said levels. Synthetics are manufactured from many starting materials, including petrochemicals and natural ingredients. There are many advantages of using synthetics, including reducing the burden on limited natural resources and lowering the impact on the environment.

templates.name: Will my plants have names included?
templates.content:
Yes, with some exceptions. We specialize in named succulent varieties, so all of our individual plants and sets include tags with the unique cultivar or species of each plant along with its hardiness rating. The tags are small plastic stakes and are durable enough to be reused after transplanting. Wholesale plug trays and trays of 2.0" pots include an ID sheet with the name and hardiness rating of each plant listed in order throughout the tray.

There are some succulents and assortments (e.g. the Build Your Own tray, mystery succulents) that do not come with name tags. Their product descriptions will state that they are unlabeled.

templates.name: How do I use Pour Moi?
templates.content:
This 3-step system is easy to follow and efficient. Follow the flow chart: Balancer -> Serum -> Moisturizer:

On a clean, dry face, apply the Hydrating Balancer with a fresh cotton pad. Using your fingers, pat the Serum onto your face. Take notice of how cool your skin feels while you let it sink in. The final step is to lock in the Serum with a Moisturizer - either a Day Cream or a Night Cream - depending on the climate and time of day. The Moisturizers seal in the moisturizing agents while preparing the surface of the skin for the climate you're in.

templates.name: Why does patina happen?/ How to clean the patina?
templates.content: In the presence of oxygen, all stainless steels will slowly form a chromium oxide "scale" layer on exposed surfaces. We see this as a patina or discoloration in the steel, which increases over time. For those who prefer, the patina can be cleaned using Bar Keeper's Friend and for others the patina becomes a badge of honor, changing over time with each new memory.

templates.name: Panel Overheating and Turning Off
templates.content:
Have you tried letting it cool down for a couple of hours?  Also if you lower the brightness and use the included USB-C to USB-A cable it should function properly again. Please make sure to fully charge it all of the way too, and if your power source is USB-C, please use the USB-C adapter that came included in your order. 

You will need to put the USB-C side of the adapter into your computer's charging port, and then combine the USB-A side of your charging cable into the USB-A section of your adapter! Please go to the 2:00 minute mark of this video and our team member Trevor describes this process in depth! https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jFEIpcZFFws&t=70s 

The charging order should look like this Laptop > Adapter > Cable > Panel 

What some customers do not realize is that there is a polarity to the cable, i.e., that the longer cable must go into the light, not the shorter one. The shorter cable goes into your power source. Lastly, I also recommend charging your light with an apple phone brick through a wall outlet with the included cable. Keep me posted on your light.

templates.name: How does the IIC system differ from ICON CDCV shocks?
templates.content: The IIC uses a variable electronic solenoid that can not only be adjusted from within the vehicle but also has a control unit that can be set to actively control the suspension damping based on the input it receives from its internal sensors. These sensors monitor cornering and G-events as well as acceleration and brake dive; constantly changing damper settings (in 40 milliseconds) to improve ride quality and handling characteristics.

templates.name: Is your thread colourfast or do I need to set it before cross stitching with it?
templates.content:
All of our threads are colourfast and fade resistant. However, some makers pre-wash embroidery floss before stitching. If you would like to, follow these instructions:

Mix one tablespoon of white vinegar with 8 fl.oz. of clear water
Soak entire skein in vinegar and clear water
If a thread has any excess dye in it, the water will show discolouration (the water will turn the same color as thread)
After soaking, take the thread out of the water/vinegar mixture and make sure it is completely dry before using

templates.name: After burning, my wick has a âball of blackâ on it which crumbles down. What is this?
templates.content: This "ball of black" is called mushrooming. All wicks will produce carbon when they are burning; some more than others. Zinc wicks usually produce more of this than some of the "cleaner-burning" wicks such as our ECO and CD series of wicks. This mushrooming effect will be reduced if you make sure to trim your wick down each time it's burned.

templates.name: Is it safe to put my Dream Cooker on the counter? Does it need a mat?
templates.content: Yes, it is safe, but we recommend the following: Avoid placing it near countertop edges during cooking. Always use it on a flat, stable, heat-resistant surface, away from heat sources and liquids. After cooking, place the inner cooking pot on a heat-resistant surface to prevent countertop damage from residual heat. While not mandatory, a heat-resistant mat can provide extra protection and style. Make sure your Dream Cooker has clearance of at least 5 inches above and at least 3 inches on all sides to ensure airflow.

templates.name: How do I load the tape on the Poly Bag Tape machine?
templates.content: To load the Poly Bag Tape machine, insert the tape on the star shaped tape holder. Pull the tape off the roll approximately 6" and place it in the machine sticky side up. Lay the tape over the slot in the top of the machine, making sure the tape is at least 2" past the end of the machine, and push a bag through the slot. When a bag is pushed into the slot, the tape will go into the slot. Seal the bag and be cut off. That's it! This will load the tape for future use. The unit should not require re-loading until a new roll of tape is installed.

templates.name: Benefits Of Hay For Guinea Pigs
templates.content:
Feeding your guinea pigs hay has numerous advantages. Perhaps most importantly it helps them regulate digestion, ensuring that their food is processed properly. Without it, your cavies can develop stomach problems such as diarrhea.

Hay is quite abrasive and helps your pigs to keep their teeth ground down to a comfortable length. Unlike humans, guinea pigs' teeth grow constantly, and without a way to keep them short, they can grow too big for their mouth, making eating difficult and painful.

templates.name: Are the Testo 550 digital HVAC gauges also a vacuum manifold?
templates.content:
The Testo 550 digital HVAC gauges are not a vacuum manifold in the traditional sense, but they can be used for vacuum measurements during system evacuation, which is why there's some confusion. 

What the Testo 550 does:
Measures refrigerant pressures (high and low side)
Calculates superheat and subcooling
Includes temperature sensors (usually clamp probes)
Has a built-in vacuum sensor, so it can monitor vacuum levels during evacuation (down to about 500 microns

What it doesn't do (as a full vacuum manifold):
It does not have a wide flow path like a dedicated vacuum manifold or vacuum-rated core removal tools do.
It's not ideal for pulling a deep vacuum quickly - it restricts flow compared to using large-diameter vacuum hoses and proper evacuation tools.
Can measure the vacuum during evacuation
Not optimized for pulling a vacuum efficiently

Recommendation:
Use the Testo 550 to monitor the vacuum, but use dedicated vacuum-rated hoses and core removal tools for the actual evacuation process.

Because it uses a pressure pump to push the water through the reverse osmosis membrane (cost for electricity is negligible), it wastes far less than the standard RO system: Only â of the input water goes down the drain (80% recovery rate), compared to 3-5 gallons that other RO systems waste per 1 gallon of filtered water produced. templates.name: What are âthick gears?â
templates.content: The term "thick gears" refers to a ring gear that is thicker than stock to maintain proper meshing in a carrier that is being upgraded with a numerically higher gear ratio. When increasing gear ratio, a smaller diameter pinion gear is employed and the thicker ring gear makes up the difference by moving the gear teeth 'higher' so the two gears mesh properly.

templates.name: How do I clean my Made In Enameled Cast Iron?
templates.content:
Rinse with hot water and mild dish soap, scrub with a non-abrasive sponge, then dry with a clean dishtowel. Making sure your Enameled Cast Iron is fully dry is key to preventing rust from forming at the rim and preventing water spots.

For tougher messes, fill the dutch oven about Â¼ with water and allow it to soak for 30 minutes. Avoid submerging for extended periods as this can also cause rust due to prolonged exposure to moisture. Once the food has been released from the surface, you can clean with mild dish soap, and a non-abrasive sponge, then dry immediately.

You can watch our video here: youtube.com/watch?v=3UWAiW6SaoU&feature=youtu.be

templates.name: Whatâs the difference between linen vs. cotton?
templates.content: Thanks to its flax fibers, linen sheets are thicker and more durable than cotton sheets. And bonus, even though it's thicker, linen is also actually more lightweight and breathable due to the hollow structure of the flax fibers. Linen is also naturally hypoallergenic, minimizing germs and allergens. When it comes to feel, cotton is crisper and smoother though, while linen is a bit more textured and relaxed. Both are great materials, and it just depends on what's important to you when it comes to bedding!

templates.name: What is the difference between the different grades of matcha?
templates.content:
All of the different grades of matcha have the same incredible health benefits, but differ in taste. The difference between the different grades of matcha is the quality of the leaves used to make them. Younger tea leaves at the top of plants that are picked earlier in harvest are the most prized leaves for matcha.

Because they are younger, they contain less stems and veins. This makes them ideal for grinding into a very fine powder, and gives the matcha a sweeter and more delicate flavor. These are the leaves that are used in our highest grade of matcha, Ceremonial Matcha.

As you move down the body of the plant the leaves are bigger and more mature. Leaves that are more mature will have more stems and veins, making the matcha less fine. Tencha leaves are deveined by hand in the process of making matcha. Because the more mature leaves are more veiny, it is harder to separate every single stem and vein from the leaf. This can make the matcha more coarse.

The best of these leaves are used to make our Ceremonial and Premium Matcha, and the leaves not chosen are used to make our Culinary Matcha.

templates.name: How do I remove build up from my ProCoat Non Stick pan?
templates.content:
At higher temperatures, a non stick pan can develop a layer of build-up that feels sticky to the touch. This build-up is cooked oils that have stuck to the pan. To remove this residue, follow the steps below.

â¢ Pour enough water to cover the bottom of your pan and add two tablespoons each of white vinegar and baking soda.
â¢ Bring the mixture to a boil and stir until the baking soda is dissolved. Continue stirring at a boil for 5 minutes.
â¢ Allow the mixture to cool completely before discarding. Rinse the pan with warm water.

templates.name: What are your testing protocols?
templates.content:
Our testing regimen begins with raw materials certified to meet our standards, from there our manufacturers conduct their own internal testing protocols, and finally, every product is sent to an independent ISO/IEC certified laboratory for final testing before being deemed worthy of our standards.

Our testing protocols include heavy metals, molds and yeast among others where applicable, and are very demanding. Every Kion employee, our friends and families utilize our products on a daily basis, thus our concern for quality is paramount. However, this concern does not end with them, it is ultimately passed onto you!

templates.name: Why did my succulent color changed?
templates.content: Many succulents, especially hardy succulents, will change color with the seasons and with variable growing conditions. Generally, succulents have the best color when stressed by sun, cold, or decreased water and fertilizer. Hardy succulents, such as Sempervivum and Sedum, usually show their brightest colors in late winter through late spring. Soft succulents, such as Echeveria and Crassula, tend to have more consistent color year-round but are influenced by the amount of direct sun they receive. In most cases, more sun results in brighter colors. But be aware that combining lots of sun with high temperatures can result in leaf burn.

templates.name: Difference between suede leather and oiled leather
templates.content:
Suede is a highly versatile leather with a visible surface nap, giving it a textured, naturally decorative finish. Its soft, velvety feel lends each style an instantly classic look while keeping the foot comfortable. Suede is typically more loose and pliable (uppers won't stand up on their own).

A favorite for its distinct heritage look, oiled leather is treated with oil and wax for a two-toned effect. Crafted so no two pairs are exactly alike, this leather is designed to age beautifully with wear. Oiled Leather is typically stiffer and requires a more calculated break-in process to allow the leather to stretch.

templates.name: Can I use it on a wood deck/composite surface?
templates.content: When paired with the Stand, you can use our fire pits on a wooden deck safely. Composite decking, such as Trex, TimberTech, Azek, TIVA, Nexan, and Versadeck, have a manufacturer fire resistance rating from A to C. You can check with your manufacturer or builder for what grade decking you have beforehand. To be safe, using a stand is required at all times when burning on composite and PVC decking. The very bottom rim of your Solo Stove is actually the coolest part of the unit, so a little insulation between your Solo and the surface it will rest on goes a long way. You can find more information on that here : https://blog.solostove.com/when-to-use-a-fire-pit-stand/ We also offer a spark arresting shield for extra protection against popping embers that might find their way in places they don't belong.

templates.name: My skin turns black or green with jewelry.
templates.content: What you're referring to is often called "staining". Good news: staining isn't caused by allergies, it's actually a reaction between the metals used in jewelry and our skin. When jewelry touches areas that perspire, the PH in our skin can react to the metal it touches. Then, our skin can turn black or green. Our jewelry doesn't have nickel and is hypoallergenic, but sometimes the copper can cause the skin to temporarily discolor.

templates.name: What is a Sierra Striated Wood Handle?
templates.content: Striated wood is also known as Pakkawood. It's a very popular choice for kitchen knife handles. It's a wood and resin layered composite that is carefully manufactured to increase the grip capability and durability of the handle. Striated/Pakkawood has good resistance to extreme heat and moisture exposure, however it's not dishwasher safe. When polished, the handle has a deep rich texture showing the various layers of composite.

templates.name: What is the difference between the S2 and the Spectrum?
templates.content:
Both the Capillus Spectrum and Capillus Pro S2 use the same FDA-cleared laser technology to help combat hair loss and promote hair regrowth. The key difference is the number of laser diodes, which affects the coverage and intensity of the treatment.
The Capillus Spectrum features 312 Laser Diodes & Near-Infrared Technology, while the Capillus Pro S2 offers 308 laser diodes for maximum scalp coverage. More laser diodes mean more stimulation per session, which can potentially enhance results over time. However, both models are effective-it really comes down to your personal hair restoration goals and budget.

templates.name: Do your products contain silicones?
templates.content: Yes, our products do contain silicones and we're a fan of them for a few reasons. For hair, silicone helps to create that silky, smooth feeling post-use. On skin, silicone acts as a barrier, letting moisture in but blocking particles like pollutants from entering. In both cases, silicone is unlikely to cause an allergic reaction, is vegan, and is known not to clog pores. For anyone who's not a fan, though, we give the option to go silicone-free for most formulas.

templates.name: What kind of weather can I ride in (Level)?
templates.content:
Level can and will tolerate biking during most permitting weather conditions. However, it is an electric bike after all, with electrical components needing some added caution. Level is built to the IPX4 water-resistant standard. IPX4 is standard that indicates your bike is resistant to multi-directional water splashes, meaning it is okay to ride or park your Level in rain. Light to moderate raindrops or splashes from a wet road will not harm your ebike, but be weary of harsher weather and rainfall conditions. Level tires are not intended for riding in snow or during snow fall.

The general rule of thumb is, if weather impacts your visibility and has the possibility to affect your bike's functionality, it is likely not a safe riding condition.

templates.content: Baby-led weaning is a method of introducing your baby to solid food. It allows babies to experiment with bringing food to their mouth from a very young age, puts babies in charge of how much to eat, gives babies the opportunity to explore new tastes and textures and can be more convenient for parents. Give BLW a shot if you're interested, but don't feel guilty if you aren't. You know what's best for your family! For more information, check out our blog post below: https://www.nurturelife.com/blog/baby-led-weaning/

templates.name: Can I exercise during and/or after fasting? How should I ease back into my exercise routine?
templates.content:
While exercise can help use up available blood glucose and move a person into a ketogenic, fasting state, vigorous exercise can stress the body and we do not recommend intense exercise during ProLon. So, while fasting, keep your activity light and do things like walking, yoga, and stretching.

Listen to your body as you ease back into exercise after fasting. If it feels like it's too much, it probably is. Don't push yourself too hard and keep the intensity at a manageable level. Remember, your body needs to recover after fasting, so it may take a few days for you to get back to the level you were at before the fast.

templates.name: What does Vitamin B-12 do?
templates.content: Vitamin B12 is essential to hemoglobin in red blood cells. It's also necessary for nerve function, the production of DNA, and cell metabolism. Symptoms of Vitamin B12 deficiency include pins and needles, nerve issues, depression, and ulcers. It is an essential vitamin - we cannot make it in the body and must consume it in food.

templates.name: How should I store my cashmere clothes?

templates.name: Travel Crib & Play Yard pad fit
templates.content:
To ensure the sleeping pad is properly installed, please be sure that the following assembly tips are followed:

- All 4 legs are locked into place. You should hear a soft snap or click as the locking mechanism of each leg engages
- Attach all four rubber feet to the bottom of each leg
- Place the custom sheet on the pad.
- Ensure that all fabric on the Travel Crib legs is pulled down into correct position and not bunched up or pulled up on leg (as this will pull up the corners of the base)

The Newton Travel Crib and Play Yard is anything but traditional, and you can expect some details to be different than you might be used to with other travel cribs. Because the sleeping pad is not attached to a rigid base, you may not see the same type of fit that you might see with a traditional travel crib. With Newton, every component has been designed and constructed to be as breathable as possible. From the sheet, through the sleeping pad and cover, all the way to the side walls of the travel crib itself - all of these fabrics are fully breathe-thru. This means that if there is an unintended bump in the fabric, you can rest easy knowing that there is no safety concern with the fully breathable mattress in the Newton Travel Crib.

All of our products are manufactured and tested under strict quality control guidelines set by the Pierre Fabre Group. All of our formulas are compliant with current European legislation and have been clinically tested by dermatologists to ensure they provide excellent results of efficacy and tolerance, even for people with hypersensitive or atopic (eczema prone) skin.

templates.name: What is Colostrum?
templates.content:
Colostrum is a natural superfood produced by all mammals in the first 48-72 hours after giving birth. It is the first nutrition we receive in life and contains all of the essential nutrients our bodies need to thrive. For 300 million years, it has served the vital function of protecting and strengthening the mucosal barriers of infants before their own barrier matures. 

Colostrum is referred to as "liquid gold" and more analogous to an immune powerhouse than a food because its nutritional value pales in comparison to the health benefits colostrum confers.

templates.name: What temperature water should I use to dissolve the Body Wash and Facial Cleanser?
templates.content: Our body wash and facial cleanser concentrates should be dissolved at room temperature or in cool water. Because you need to shake the bottle in order to dissolve the concentrate, if you use warm water, it will cause the air trapped inside the bottle to expand while shaking, leading some of the lather to spurt out of the bottle after you finish shaking it. As a result, our team recommends using room temperature or cool water to make the body wash and facial cleanser. Our concentrate is formulated to dissolve in any temperature of water with just a few shakes.

templates.name: Will you remove my old mattress?
templates.content:
We offer disposal options for previously owned mattresses in our In-Home Delivery & Setup markets, and as mandated throughout the state of California. If you require mattress disposal in California, please reach out to our customer experience team: https://help.casper.com/s/contactsupport?language=en_US

If your order does not include In-Home Delivery & Setup and your mattress is still in good condition - without tears or stains - you can check if Salvation Army will pick it up and repurpose it on their website, or you can also refer to a local charity. Also, many cities provide bulk recycling pick-up, as long as your bulky items are wrapped in a plastic furniture bag. All New York City customers can leave their old mattresses out on the curb with the rest of their recycling and the city will take care of it. If you are located elsewhere, we suggest calling your local authorities to see if they have a similar program in place.

If neither of those options are viable, 1-800-GOT-JUNK? can do the leg work. While this option isn't free, they will pick up the mattress (and box spring if you're also parting with that), do everything they can to get the mattress repurposed, or otherwise dispose of it safely.

templates.name: Bedding: Whatâs the difference between the bamboo comforter and the silk comforter? Which one should I choose?
templates.content: Both comforters wick moisture, keep you feeling less humid and much cooler. The difference is the general feel and your personal preference. Do you prefer a larger, fluffy, down-feeling comforter? If so, go with silk. It's extremely luxurious, puffier, and mushier. Do you prefer a comforter with a thinner profile to cuddle you up but not too full? The Bamboo comforter is like a super soft quilt and it's perfect for those who want something that is never going to get too hot.

templates.name: What are the similarities between gel- and copper-infused mattress toppers?
templates.content:
The top similarities of these two incredible toppers are their comfort, cooling effects, and breathability. Both the gel and copper mattress toppers have the same base-memory foam-which gives them a similar feel. Memory foam mattresses and toppers were created to relieve pressure and regulate body temperature. The gel and copper infusions only intensify the underlying benefits of the memory foam.

The one drawback of almost any memory foam infused mattress topper is a chemical smell upon opening. However, this smell is not harmful since ours are made from CertiPUR-US certified foam, which is tested to be free of harmful toxins and materials. The smell will quickly dissipate as the mattress topper airs out.

Test temperature before serving and always refer to the packaging on your meal for specific safe handling instructions.

templates.name: What elevation is your coffee grown at?
templates.content: When coffee is grown at higher altitudes (at least 5,700ft above sea level), it has a number of beneficial effects on the beans. When you grow coffee at a higher altitude it slows the development and ripening of the beans. This is because the temperature of the environment is cooler which causes the beans to develop more slowly. The slow growth of the beans allows them to absorb more nutrients and become much more dense and harder than grow coffee at lower elevations. This means that there are more antioxidants in the beans and that you will get more out of the coffee you are drinking.

templates.name: Are your mattresses flippable?
templates.content:
Most Brooklyn Bedding mattresses should be rotated every 6 to 8 months but never flipped (or inverted). Our mattresses are designed with comfort layers on top and support layers on bottom, including individually encased coils in hybrid models. We also use higher quality materials that last much longer than traditional mattresses. 

The exceptions to the "no flip" rule are the Plank and Plank Hybrid mattresses, the EcoSleep and the Propel All-Foam and Propel Hybrid mattresses by Brooklyn Bedding. These mattresses are designed with varying firmness levels on either side of the mattress and can be flipped to customize your sleep experience.

templates.name: What is the best way to hang a canvas?

Smaller canvases have saw-tooth hangers installed in the center of the back of the frame. You may choose to add your own hardware if you have a preference for how to hang your artwork. When hanging art, the general rule of thumb is to have the center of the piece at the average persons eye-level. Galleries will often hang the center of the art from 60" - 66". templates.name: Source Hand Held - How do I replace the filter?
templates.content: Remove the hand-held unit from the bracket. Then grasp the top half of the hand-held unit and twist the bottom half counter-clockwise before pulling down firmly. Remove the adhesive labels on the new filter and push it firmly into the bottom housing of the handle. It does not matter which direction it's inserted into the housing. Twist the halves back together and return the hand-held unit to the hand-held bracket. Make sure to flush with hot water for 5 minutes before showering.

templates.name: How do you take T3 Conversion Booster?
templates.content: The recommended dose is 2 capsules taken each day (with or without food) before noon and at least 30-60 minutes away from your thyroid medication (if you take any). At 2 capsules each day this supplement will provide you with a 60 day supply. Some thyroid patients may benefit from doubling the dose up to 4 capsules per day by taking 2 capsules in the morning and 2 capsules in the afternoon/evening. This is ideal for those with high reverse T3 levels or very low T3 levels.

templates.name: Should I hand wash your products or can I use the dishwasher?

templates.name: What is the difference between a locker and a limited-slip differential?
templates.content: Lockers produce 100% lock-up where all the power is directed to both tires all the time when the unit is engaged and they are tougher. Limited slips direct torque to both tires and when slippage occurs the unit directs torque to the tire with the best traction. LSDs don't generate 100% lock-up. Limited-slip diffs don't require activation from the driver. Their engagement is mechanical, a reaction to driving conditions, namely load and wheel slippage.

templates.name: Why was my order flagged as high risk of fraud?
templates.content: Our orders have a high price point, so our e-commerce platform has a system that scans any of our orders for what may be characteristics of an order being placed fraudulently. These characteristics can include multiple payment attempts, incorrect billing address, IP address distance from the billing address, or other factors. This system is essentially in place to ensure that the cardholder is the person who is placing the order. Unfortunately, if it is flagged, we do have to request further information to verify the purchase. We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience.

templates.name: What are hops? Are they healthy?
templates.content: Hops are the flowers of the hop plant Humulus lupulus, which in Latin means something like extremely delicious. They are used primarily as a bittering, flavoring, and stability agent in beer, to which, in addition to bitterness, they impart floral, fruity, or citrus flavours and aromas. In a conveniently beautiful twist of fate, studies also show hops can be effective in reducing stress and anxiety. Hops contain flavonoids which have potent antioxidant, anti-inflammatory, and anti-bacterial properties. A flavonoid in hops has also been found to help reduce weight gain, lower elevated cholesterol, and reduce high blood sugar.

templates.name: Sunflower oil concerns
templates.content: Babies and toddlers need fat in their diet for growth and brain development. It's only unhealthy for babies to get too much of just one type of fat. Offering a bunch of different fat sources is important for babies. Sunflower oil has a fat profile with a complementary type of polyunsaturated fat and monounsaturated fat as compared to our other fats, providing a good balance. Sunflower oil is also a wonderful source of vitamin E, which is a key nutrient during the critical period of toddler brain development.

templates.name: How do I clean Feeder-Robot?
templates.content: Use cleaner wipes on removable parts (or hand wash with mild soap); let completely air dry before re-assembling Feeder-Robot. templates.name: Do I need new tubes?
templates.content: Installing new tubes may improve the performance of your amp, especially if it has been played a lot! Power tubes wear out with use, and they need changed on a regular basis. Preamp tubes can last much longer, and generally do not need to be changed unless you are unsatisfied with the sound of the amplifier. If your amp still sounds good and is as loud as it should be, you likely do not need to replace the tubes yet.

templates.name: How can I deep clean my pan?
templates.content: For the interior: fill the pan halfway with water and bring it to a near boil for about 2 minutes. Pour out the water and place the pan on a sturdy surface such as a wooden cutting board. Carefully use a restoring sponge (melamine) on the warm surface, this should do the trick. For the exterior: mix baking soda and a little water to form a smooth paste; then use paper towel to rub the paste over the stained area (exterior surfaces only).

templates.name: What are the main differences in formulas between Nutrafol Men, Women, Women's Vegan, Postpartum, and Women's Balance?
templates.content:
Our Hair Growth Nutraceuticals are clinically effective and physician-formulated to the bio-specific needs of men and women through all life stages and lifestyles. The key root causes of thinning hair affect men and women differently and can change over time-so we created multiple formulas to give your hair exactly what it needs, when it needs it most.

Women's formula focuses on addressing the key root causes of hair thinning for women 18-44 years old when stress, lifestyle habits and nutrition play a heightened role in hair health.

Women's Vegan is formulated for women 18-44 with the key root causes of thinning focusing on stress and lifestyle habits plus it is optimized to support plant-based diet's nutrition and absorption of nutrients in the body that affect hair health.

Women's Balance is formulated for women 45+ to support the key root causes of hair thinning for women such as stress with optimized support for hormonal changes, such as menopause that affect hair health.

Postpartum is OBGYN-formulated to address the key root causes of hair thinning and shedding for women within the first year of giving birth and through the time they are breastfeeding such as the physical and emotional stress, hormonal changes and nutritional support.

Men's formula multi-targets the key root causes of thinning for men 18+ such as stress and poor nutrition with optimized support of hair-growth inhibiting DHT hormone, without compromising sexual performance.

templates.name: How is No-Show™ Mineral Sunscreen SPF different from Face Shield Classic SPF 50?
templates.content:
Our Total Protection™ Face Shield SPF products are formulated with Iron Oxides which offer a tint to them, in a range of shades and effects, whereas No-Show™ Mineral does not contain any iron oxides and is untinted. While Face Shield Classic leaves no color coverage for many of our customers, we know many still have a need for an all-mineral, untinted sunscreen without white cast. Our untinted, all-mineral No-Show™ sunscreen provides the same powerful Total Protection™ and skin-health benefits (hydration, calming, free radical defense) as our Face Shields, it:

- is ideal for someone who does not want tint due to transfer onto clothing (i.e. men and shirt collars): 
- provides the sheerest-of-the-sheer aesthetic for deeper skin tones who have often had to use chemical filters to avoid white cast
- is also great for the Face Shield user on days when they want to be color/makeup free, (like working out), or using on hands, and body.

templates.name: What are the food pathways affected by the ProLon program?
templates.content: While there are many different signaling factors in the "nutrient-sensing pathways" involved with cellular fasting, the 3 primary nutrient-sensing pathways that ProLon and fasting down-regulate are IGF-1, mTOR, and PKA. The process is complex, and each pathway can interact with other pathways, but in general, PKA responds primarily to sugar and carbohydrates, while IGF-1 is primarily responsive to protein (and more strongly triggered by animal protein), and mTOR is triggered by IGF-1 and amino acids. Sugar and carbohydrates (and to some extent caffeine) will activate PKA. These nutrient-sensing pathways all help regulate the cells' growth cycles and stress-resistant "fasting" state.

templates.name: I get a reaction when I use your products / I feel sick
templates.content: If you experience cold-like symptoms such as runny nose, stuffy nose, coughing, etc, then there's a possibility that you're having a reaction to an ingredient in the Pro Base and Finish Gel. Reactions can vary from mild to a more severe one. There are a few things you can do to help minimize your reaction. First, the area should be well ventilated when using the product, this will minimize the fumes. Consider a small fan pointing away from you as you apply. Second, watch that you don't hunch over the product to see better - getting very close to the open bottle to see your nails better will cause you to inhale more of it. This is one of the most common reasons women develop a reaction. A bright light over your workspace will help with this. There are also masks available that will minimize your reaction. If you're experiencing a reaction, please consult your doctor. Your health is the most important thing to us. If you feel like using Dip Powder is causing your body to have a negative reaction, please stop using it.

templates.name: How will my Allform furniture stand up to use by my pets?
templates.content:
Both our fabric and leather options are designed with pets in mind, including durable scratch, spill, and stain resistance across our entire fabric lineup. In the furniture industry, fabrics undergo what is called a double-rub test where the fabric is rubbed back and forth until it wears down. A score of more than 15,000 on the rub test is considered heavy duty. Allform fabrics earned a 55,000 rub test, making them 3.5 times more durable than the heavy duty standard.

As for our leathers, we use top-grain selections that include a protected finish to guard against everyday use. Scratches and scuffs can be easily buffed out of the surface with a chamois cloth and a small amount of water. With that said, we don't recommend allowing your pet to excessively scratch or knead the surface of your furniture.

templates.name: Is shedding normal?
templates.content:
It's perfectly normal for a makeup brush to shed a few hairs, 
especially when the brush is new or has not been washed before. A brush shedding in larger quantities is not normal and could be considered a manufacturing defect.

All brushes can be cleaned with a mild shampoo, reshaped, and dried properly after washing to remove excess fibers. Our Brush Cleaning Mat and the 2X Brush Cleaning Glove are great tools to deep clean your brushes.

templates.name: What is the break-in procedure for a new set of gears?
templates.content: All new gear sets require a break-in period to prevent damage from overheating. After driving the first 15 or 20 miles it's best to let the differential cool before proceeding. We recommend at least 500 miles before towing. We also recommend towing for very short distances (less than 15 miles) and letting the differential cool before continuing during the first 45 towing miles. This may seem unnecessary but we have seen many differentials damaged from being loaded before the gear set was broken in. Changing the gear oil after the first 500 miles is also recommend. This will remove any metal particles or phosphorus coating that has come from the new gear set.

Other ingredients which are made in the U.S. are very expensive vs. the same ingredient produced in countries like Mexico and Brazil. Regardless of where any of our ingredients come from, they all meet the highest standards, are non-GMO and are the best quality we can purchase.

templates.name: What materials do you use/offer?
templates.content:
We offer 3 different materials:
 
Gold-Plated - Starts with a base layer of hypoallergenic surgical steel, which is plated in 14k-18k gold using our proprietary method, allowing for long-lasting, non-fading wear. These pieces feature hand-set AAAA+ CZ stones.
 
Vermeil - Crafted using only precious metals it starts with a .925 Sterling Silver base metal and is plated with 3 microns of 18k gold, and set with AAAA+ CZ stones. Vermeil is an excellent choice when you want to own a more valuable piece of jewelry and it tends to be slightly heavier than our gold-plated options.

templates.name: What kind of weather can I ride in (Soltera)?
templates.content:
Soltera can and will tolerate biking during most permitting weather conditions. However, it is an electric bike after all, with electrical components needing some added caution. Soltera is built to the IPX4 water-resistant standard. IPX4 is a standard that indicates your bike is resistant to multi-directional water splashes, meaning it is okay to ride or park your Soltera in rain. Light to moderate raindrops or splashes from a wet road will not harm your ebike, but be wary of harsher weather and rainfall conditions. Soltera tires are not intended for riding in snow or during snowfall.

The general rule of thumb is, if weather impacts your visibility and has the possibility to affect your bike's functionality, it is likely not a safe riding condition.

templates.name: What's the Difference Between Laser and LED Light?
templates.content:
The main difference is in how the light behaves. Laser light is coherent, meaning it's highly focused, with all light waves moving in the same direction and phase-this allows it to penetrate deeper into the skin and deliver targeted results. LED light is incoherent, meaning it spreads out, cannot be focused, and loses energy, making it less effective for deeper treatments.

Our caps use laser diodes for maximum effectiveness, while our masks, panel, eyelift, and healing pod use LEDs, which are ideal for surface-level skin benefits. 

For further details, you can check: https://capillus.attn.tv/aRHunhaEplb3

How quick the plating will tarnish depends on your use, but to have it last the longest, remove your jewelry before showering, swimming, washing hands, etc. and store in your jewelry bag when not in use and away from the sun. Sleeping in jewelry will also tarnish the pieces so try not to wear it to bed.

We would recommend taking measurements of the current tuners, and compare those to the dimensions and specs listed on our website. For tuners, it is important to match peghole diameter, mounting screw spacing, and post hole spacing.

templates.name: How does the 120-Night Trial work?
templates.content:
Every Nolah mattress purchase includes a 120-night at-home sleep trial. If against all expectations, you don't love your mattress, you can return it for a full refund. Our logistics partner will pick up the mattress; you're only responsible for a $99 flat fee to cover labor and one-way transportation.

The trial begins the day your mattress arrives. Sleep on your Nolah mattress for at least 30 nights before making a decision-this gives you enough time to adjust to your new bed and fully experience its comfort and support benefits.

If you wish to return your mattress, email us at support@nolahmattress.com. To qualify for a full refund, you must initiate the return process after the 30-night break-in period but before the 120-night trial expires.

templates.name: How do I gift a subscription?
templates.content:
There are a few different options to gift someone a subscription of their own:
 
 1. You can place an order and start a subscription for your friend. They would then have to update the payment information with their card after the first month (or your card will continue to be charged). Please know you can cancel the subscription after the first month if you don't want to wait for them to update the payment method.
 
 2. You can send them a gift card and they can order the threads of their choosing.
 
 3. You can send them a one-time order, and if they like it, they can start their own subscription!

templates.name: How do I calculate my macros?
templates.content:
Macros stand for macronutrients of which there are three: fats, protein,
and carbs. On the keto diet, we eat 75% of our daily calories from fat, 
20% from protein and only 5% from carbs. You can read more about it here: https://teamketo.freshdesk.com/support/solutions/articles/73000570544-how-do-i-calculate-my-macros- You can also use our keto calculator which will help you determine the precise amount of fat, protein, and carbs you should eat each day on the keto diet: https://teamketo.com/pages/keto-calculator

templates.name: What are you doing to stop plastic from entering the ocean?

While our cleanup crews that work 7 days a week are a huge part of it, there's so much more that goes into cleaning the ocean. We need to invest in our vessels and make sure our crews have the right equipment to properly clean the unique terrains. Our facilities house and properly store the trash we are recovering. Advocacy and education continue to spread awareness which is vital to ending ocean pollution. As well as research and development to create innovative ways to use the trash we are recovering.

templates.name: Why do dogs love air-dried food?
templates.content: Air-drying the food produces a jerky-like texture dogs adore. Jerky has typically been given as treats to lucky dogs, but now they get an equivalent with every meal. Our formula also maintains a high protein content - fresh meat accounts for 80% of the ingredients. And anytime you add more meat (that's of the highest quality), dogs just love it. Moreover, as the name suggests, air-dried food is never frozen and anytime food is frozen, it becomes less palatable.

templates.name: How do I center a wick in the container?
templates.content: The easiest way to ensure your wick is centered is to use the EZ Wick Setter or Multi EZ Wick Setter. If you don't have one of these, you'll have to estimate where the center of the jar is when you are putting in your wick. It helps if you adhere the wick tab to the bottom of the container so that it doesn't move around when the wax is poured.  We have Glue Dots and Wick Stickers to assist with this, or you may prefer to use a hot glue gun. Once the wick is in place in the bottom of the container, it also helps to secure the wick at the top of the container with a wick bar or something that won't allow the wick to lean to one side as the candle cools.

templates.name: Can Revaree treat  yeast infections or BV?
templates.content: Revaree isn't intended to treat yeast infections or BV, but to treat vaginal atrophy and associated symptoms of dryness, burning, irritation, and painful sex. However, we do have a product called Clairvee that's been proven to work effectively alongside antibiotics and antifungals, which treat BV and VVC (though it isn't meant to replace antibiotics or antifungals for the treatment of BV or VVC). If you have any specific concerns, you should speak to your healthcare provider.

templates.name: Can the Power 1100 be plugged into a device and be charged by solar simultaneously?
templates.content: Yes, the Power 1100 can charge devices as it is being charged through one of our Solar options. Please note: When charging through the rear DC input port, the USB-C and USB QC 3.0 ports will be deactivated due to the design of the circuit board. All other ports will work. If you need to charge your Power 1100 while also using the USB-C or USB QC 3.0 ports, the front DC output ports will also allow charging using solar or the provided AC adapter. When charging using the front DC output, the remaining DC output ports may not be used for other loads.

templates.name: Does your waterproof mattress make a lot of noise?
templates.content: Our approach to waterproofing is unique, as we don't place the waterproof liner on top of the mattress, but actually quilt it into the bottom layer of the cover, under 2 layers of highly breathable spacer material. This allows for a channel of air between your baby and the waterproof layer, and less chances of noise keeping your baby awake. The biggest risk for suffocation during child development is during the first 12 months. Though the waterproof side is still breathable, we want infants to have the most breathable, completely unhindered airflow sleeping environment possible for the first year, which is why we recommend waiting until year 1 to use the waterproof side, however, you know your child's development and mobility best. While we understand Waterproofing seems most desirable to help with messes, the infant side of the cover is water-resistant and when babies leak or *explode* in the first year of life, these accidents are easily managed by washing the cover and most times even rinsing the core.

templates.name: I can't seem to find my scoop, what should I do?

So we definitely recommend grabbing a fork or butter knife and going on a quick scavenger hunt for the scoop buried beneath. But if you truly cannot find a scoop, you've got two options: use your own measuring spoon or request a replacement. If you can't find the scoop and would like to send your order back and get a replacement, just let me know! I'll be more than happy to help out.

templates.name: How do Luminous Materials work on my watch?
templates.content:
The "glow" from the luminous materials in our timepieces will last depending on the type of light the watch is exposed to. It also depends on the number of luminous materials on the dial and hands. On average the glow will last from about 15-30 minutes in a dark setting.

Unlike radioactive materials that are used by some companies, the non-radioactive materials we use do not have a constant level of "light emission". This results in a very "bright" glow shortly after light exposure that diminishes over a period of time. When the two materials are compared side by side, the level of light emitted is the same.

templates.name: What is the difference between Thermella and Relizen?
templates.content:
Thermella and Relizen were both shown in separate clinical studies to relieve hot flashes and night sweats. However, Thermella relieves hot flashes as early as just two weeks. It relieves hot flashes at the source by blocking NKB, a peptide in the body's thermoregulatory center that triggers hot flashes and night sweats. On the other hand, Relizen works as early as two months by inhibiting the reuptake of serotonin in the body. Both treatments are effective, but Thermella has been shown to provide more hot flash and night sweat relief, faster. 

Please note that these results for Thermella and Relizen are based on separate clinical studies for each product.

templates.name: How long can your sunscreens last after being opened? / Expiration date of sunscreens / Why am I not seeing an expiration date on your sunscreens?
templates.content: The FDA has established requirements for all over-the-counter drug products (sunscreens) to go through stability testing to assure products are stable and have appropriate expiry dating. All products with less than 3 years real-time stability testing must include an expiry date on their packaging per federal regulations. After the product passes 3-year real-time stability testing then a company has the choice to no longer include an expiry date as the testing supports stability for at least 3 years. Our sunscreen products that have finished going through 3-year FDA stability testing are no longer required to have an expiration date as the products are found to be extremely stable.  Products such as our Brush-On Shield SPF 50, Face Shields (Classic, Matte, Glow, and Bronze), Body Shield, Even Up, All Calm, and Total Eye 3-in-1 Renewal Therapy SPF 35 have passed stability testing that proves their 3 year efficiency; therefore, the FDA doesn't require a labeled expiration date and these items don't list one. We recommend using the product within the indicted PAO (period-after-opening) timeframe once the product is opened and activated. You can always find that time by looking at the open jar icon that can be found on your product. On most products you will find the PAO is 12 months. This timeframe is a recommended guideline for using the product at its peak efficacy.

templates.name: What are Vionic insoles made of and how long will they last?
templates.content:
Vionic insoles and sandals are made of a flexible material called EVA (ethyl vinyl acetate). The key advantage of EVA is that it is supportive and 'giving' at the same time! As you apply weight to the foot, there is a certain amount of 'give' in Vionic insoles and sandals, providing shock absorption to the feet, ankles, knees, hips and back. This makes the device much more comfortable and more natural compared to hard insoles. Yet, at the same time, they are firm enough to realign the foot and allow you to claim back your natural footprint.

Because Vionic insoles and sandals are somewhat flexible, they will need to be replaced every 12-18 months.
